message: After leaving the room soaked in lewd smells and our sweat, even this garish, toxic-looking room feels strangely comforting.
The overwhelming ecstasy from earlier has vanished like a lie, and now I’m just left shocked and guilty that I had such desires.

name: Madam
message: Oh my, that was awfully quick, wasn't it‥‥‥‥‥

name: Madam
message: Mabel didn't suit your taste？

name: Madam
message: Didn't you like Sue？

name: Jonathan
message: No, that's not true.

name: Madam
message: I bet you are, you've got such a satisfied look on your face.
Did this girl get too fired up and end up sucking it all out completely？

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, that's right.........
I had no idea I was that kind of person.

name: Madam
message: That's what a brothel is, you know.
It means you can meet the other you who was oppressed and sunk to the bottom of your consciousness.

name: Madam
message: You can stay until morning, you know？
In another two or three hours, you'll probably be feeling completely better.

name: Jonathan
message: No, sorry, but I can't just do that.
I've　got　something　I　absolutely　can't　get　out　of.

name: Madam
message: I see...... That's a shame.
Come again sometime. Next time, I'll personally keep you company.

name: Madam
message: Oh, you’re the one from earlier……

name: Madam
message: You're here again？
You sure like it more than you look like you would.

name: Jonathan
message: No, that's not it.

name: Madam
message: You don't have to make excuses, all men are like that.　　　　　　So, which girl do you want next？

name: Thomas
message: Yo, Madam！
I　came　again,　just　like　I　promised.
The room is filled with an overpowering thick perfume scent and the sweet body odor of a woman.
The woman Thomas called Madam seemed somewhat older than the other two prostitutes, and since she's called 'Madam,' she's probably the owner of this brothel.

name: Madam
message: Oh, really！
Thanks for coming, is that person over there your friend？

name: Thomas
message: So your name's Jonathan.
Looks like it's your first time at a place like this, so take care of me, alright?

name: Madam
message: Oh, is that so.
I'm glad your first time was at our place, I promise you won't be disappointed！

name: Madam
message: Sue, Mabel, say hello.
This is Jonathan.

name: Sue
message: Nice to meet you, I'm Sue.

name: Mabel
message: Hello, my name is Mabel.

name: Madam
message: She’s young and doesn’t know a lick of manners, but when it comes to that kind of thing, she’s just fine. After all, I was the one who personally drilled it into her.

name: Thomas
message: I've already checked that myself.
You're the star today, so pick from Jonathan.

name: Jonathan
message: Even if you tell me to choose......

name: Madam
message: You're really shy, aren't you......
It's decorated with gaudy ornaments.
The strong smell of perfume is wafting through the air, and it's making me feel sick.
Setting aside the slightly unique vibe, it's a stylish interior that could pass for a lower-middle-class hotel room even in London.
I've never been in a place like a brothel before, but is it always like this everywhere?
Compared to places like the Fish Scale Inn or Gilman House, they seem more proactive with investing in their facilities.
That just means there's that much profit to be made.
It's got some pretty stylish decorations.
Maybe paying attention to these little details is proof that they're running their business seriously.
It probably wasn't easy at all to set up a shop like this in Arkham. The lady owner here might actually be pretty shrewd.

name: Madam
message: Sorry, but Mabel is still in the middle of keeping Thomas company.

name: Madam
message: Wanna try being Sue again？
If you want, I could keep you company too...

name: Madam
message: You're tired, aren't you？
If possible, I'd rather keep you company when you're a bit more energetic.

name: Madam
message: Sue, you've been called.
Come on, come on, hurry up and lift your heavy butt！

name: Sue
message: I'm glad you picked me！
People like you are pretty much my type.

name: Madam
message: Well, that's great for you.
Do your best to give them all the service you possibly can.

name: Sue
message: Shall we go？
My room's over there.

name: Madam
message: Thomas, what are you gonna do？

name: Thomas
message: What do you mean, 'do what'？
The only one left is Mabel now, right?

name: Madam
message: There's an exceptional one left right in front of you.

name: Thomas
message: Thanks, but I’ll stick with Mabel. She’s the one I always go with since I started coming here！

name: Madam
message: Well, that's no fun.
Mabel,　show　Mr.　Thomas　to　his　room.

name: Mabel
message: Yeah......

name: Sue
message: What are you doing, come on, let's go already？

name: Madam
message: Both of you, do your best.
It's already late at night, so we're not letting any more customers into the shop tonight.

name: Thomas
message: See ya, Jonathan.

name: Madam
message: You've been watching Sue for a while now, huh? Do you like her?

name: Jonathan
message: Hmm, I guess so. I do think you're cute, though...

name: Madam
message: Sue is from Norway, you ever been with a Scandinavian girl？　　　　　　When it comes to beautiful skin, they rival Oriental women.
She seems to be just a little older than Cordelia, but she definitely looks like a working girl, with heavy makeup.

With her adorable face, she really doesn't look like a girl working as a prostitute, and honestly, she doesn’t even fit in here in Arkham, but the way she's sitting with her legs crossed, leaning her body against the armrest and looking up at me-it's a pose carefully trained to seduce men.
The way the sensual curves of her body show through the thin Gown feels a bit out of balance with her rather baby-faced expression, but there are probably people who'd find that appealing.
She gives her body to several men every night, and people probably insult her as a lowly prostitute, but there’s no hint of gloom on her face at all.
She seems totally different from the London women who, troubled in life, end up becoming prostitutes.

name: Madam
message: Sorry, Sue is still keeping Thomas company.　　　　　　At this rate, she probably won't let him go until morning.

name: Madam
message: What do we do？
Wanna do it with Mabel again？

name: Madam
message: If you want, I could keep you company myself......
You're already tired, aren't you？

name: Madam
message: It's pretty rare for me to take on customers myself, you know.
If you're gonna do it anyway, pamper me a whole lot when I'm feeling more energetic.

name: Madam
message: Mabel, Jonathan is calling for you.

name: Mabel
message: Yes, Madam…………

name: Madam
message: Come on now, hurry up and take him to the room！
Make　sure　you　enjoy　yourselves　plenty,　okay?

name: Madam
message: It's already late tonight, so no more customers until morning.
Thomas, what about you？

name: Thomas
message: What am I supposed to do about it, huh?

name: Madam
message: Who are you going to choose, me or Sue?

name: Thomas
message: Sorry, but I prefer younger girls over older women.　　　　　　I've been close with Sue ever since she first came to the shop, you know.

name: Madam
message: Well, that's no fun at all.
Alright, Sue, go on, hurry up.

name: Mabel
message: Jonathan, over here.

name: Thomas
message: See ya, Jonathan.
Go and have as much fun as you can.

name: Madam
message: Looks like you've taken a liking to Mabel.

name: Jonathan
message: She's a pretty quiet girl.

name: Madam
message: For someone who grew up in London, I’m not that jaded, right？
But I'm not as well-behaved in bed as I look！

name: Madam
message: If you're not careful, you'll get sucked dry until you can't even stand.　　　　　　Better watch yourself.
She seems a bit older than the girl next door, and, in contrast to the active and schoolgirlish Sue, she has a calm and intelligent vibe.
Her beautiful black hair, rivaling Cordelia's, is cut evenly at shoulder length, brushing slightly over her face-which is more accurately described as stunningly beautiful than simply cute.
Unlike Sue, who's open about flirting with men, she's a bit more reserved; only the tips of her toes are visible from under the quiet Gown she's wearing.
The eyes looking at me seem afraid that if a customer chooses them, they'll be disappointed, like they don't really want to be picked.
Since she's content to be holed up in a place like this, she probably has some dark past that's casting a shadow over her now, but it would be pretty tactless to ask about it.

name: Madam
message: Your friend Thomas is still in the middle of having fun.
I don't think they'll be coming out until probably morning, though？

name: Jonathan
message: Thomas, do you come here a lot？

name: Madam
message: Yeah, it seems like she started coming here a while after moving to this village.　　　　　　Out in the sticks like this, there’s nothing else fun to do, you know?

name: Jonathan
message: When she comes here, does she usually stay until morning？

name: Madam
message: Yes, that's right.
Look at that body-on mornings after she's been with him, it sounds like she's so worn out she can't even stand up.

name: Madam
message: Looks like you're having trouble picking which girl you want.
If you don't choose soon, it'll be morning.

name: Jonathan
message: But, even if you ask me to choose, you know......

name: Madam
message: You don't need to worry about it that much.
It's not like tonight is the last night in this world, right？

name: Madam
message: No matter which you choose, I promise you won't regret it.
Come　on,　hurry　up　and　decide　already.

name: Madam
message: Take your time and browse as much as you like.
If it were some stuck-up ladies, they wouldn't allow something like that, but all the girls here have such good hearts, you know.

name: Madam
message: What's wrong？
Hurry up and pick a girl.

name: Jonathan
message: No, but......

name: Madam
message: How long are you gonna mope around?
If you've come this far, isn't it smarter to just have fun?

name: Madam
message: Got it, you’ve got someone good back in your country, right？
So　that's　why　you're　feeling　guilty,　huh.

name: Madam
message: You don't have to worry about that！
What happens here is just playing around, you know. My mind and this part down here are totally separate things.

name: Jonathan
message: Not the country, but inside this village...

name: Madam
message: Just pick one already.
If you want, I can choose for you？

name: Madam
message: Let's see......

name: Madam
message: You, despite how you look, don't you prefer strong-willed girls？
You get off on making cheeky girls submit in Bed, don't you.

name: Madam
message: Then......

name: Jonathan
message: No, that's enough.
I'll decide for myself, so be quiet.

name: Madam
message: Then go ahead.
Go outside
